subject: Re: [sugar] sanitycheck / libabiword-plugins patches
body:
Manuel Aguilar wrote:
> Yes, it does fail if you don't have cups.h
> The build I ran was a standard one, I'm not developing anything at the 
> moment.

Strange. I'd like to see a config.log of the failure since I can't 
reproduce it. I'd rather not add more dependencies to jhbuild if they 
are not strictly necessary.

Marco
